participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: caring and resilient, with a passion for crafting and family
participant_1.background: i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: Arthur
participant_2.personality: knowledgeable and curious, with a love for history and a unique perspective on life
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am a museum tour guide. i am partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea.
